name: Martial Art Sage
text: This card face-up in the Extra Deck, on the field, or in the GY is also treated as a Spellcaster type monster. If you control a Level 5 or higher Earth or Spellcaster monster: You can Special Summon this card from your hand. If this card is destroyed: You can send 1 Earth Warrior monster from your Deck to your GY. You can only activate each effect of "Martial Art Sage" once per turn.
monster_type: You can destroy this face-up card; add 1 "Polymerization" from your Deck to your hand.
